    • Uses of Cipher in geyerhamplkocsis

      Classes in geyerhamplkocsis that implement Cipher 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KeywordCipher
      To encrypt a String, this class will add a keyword in the beginning of the secret alphabet.
      class  MonoalphabeticCipher
      The MonoalphabeticCipher class to decrypt and encrypt a text
      class  ShiftCipher
      To encrypt a String the last digits of the standard alphabet will be moved.
      class  SubstitutionCipher
      The SubstitutionCipher to set the secretalphabet
